text: Maria de Jesus Simões Barroso Soares, GCL (2 May 1925 – 7 July 2015) was a Portuguese politician and actress. She was the wife of former Portuguese President Mário Soares. She served as First Lady of Portugal between 1986 and 1996. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Portuguese politicians Category:Portuguese movie actors
title: Maria Barroso
